explains: v. 推进，驱动；推搡（某人走向特定方向）； 驱使，促使

sentences.en: The tiny rocket is attached to the spacecraft and is designed to propel it toward Mars.
sentences.cn: 微型火箭附在宇宙飞船上，用来推进飞船飞向火星。

sentences.en: He also used ski poles in an unorthodox way—to propel himself as he skied.
sentences.cn: 他还以一种非正统的方式使用滑雪杖，就是在滑雪时用它推动自己。

sentences.en: It now appears that they also have an important influence on the geophysical processes that propel the plates across the globe.
sentences.cn: 现在看来，它们对推动板块在全球范围内运动的地球物理过程也有重要影响。
